subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Trevor Ariza is living the dream, playing for an N.B.A. championship in his hometown. It just took a few detours to get here, and one fateful assist from the Orlando Magic.
snippet: Trevor Ariza is living the dream, playing for an N.B.A. championship in his hometown. It just took a few detours to get here, and one fateful assist from the Orlando Magic.
